page.title: 15MY ROAD IN BOUGHTON
page.content: I looked out of my window and saw the postman cut across the garden. When I came out to play I saw the footprints on the mud. In our road there are some men putting phone wires in. There is a park where we play;the boys make goals for football. At night you can hear the motorway. Our road is noisy with people playing hopscotch, running and jumping. There are about 29 houses and lots of children down our road. When people pass they drop litter. My dad never cleans the car, he gives me the job. When mum hangs out her washing, she always starts nattering to my next door neighbour. Down the road there is a great big house with a well looked after garden and a lampost outside.My front garden has a wall, and if you stand on it, you can see a long way off. That's what happens down our road.
